name: Recoil (itch) (ZachDT)
description:
Recoil is a single player arena battler with minimalist graphics. You play as a ball that's trying to knock other balls off of a platform (yes, this is the entire canonical lore). Knock balls off the platform, get abilities, fight stronger balls with harder abilities, and even maybe battle a square or perhaps some regular polyhedra? No, just balls.

This game was primarily made as a learning experience, so any feedback is appreciated!
